description.text:
First, spy at the smallest from the farthest distance away
Second, gas that of forgotten caves in a far-out city
Third, cause a furious test subject some furious remains
Fourth, gather freaks numbered this step to the last
Fifth, slay a three-headed menace far, far above limbo
Sixth, end the world ten times over with full uncured audiences from all over the world
Seventh, slay a grayed invincible zombie
Eighth, frame perfection
Ninth, slay a spinoffs much memed character, the name of which must be guessed
Tenth, if you achieve it, you will waste 65 hours. Do this step 1000 times
